Description.Details:
A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. Heavy Gauss Rifles hit harder than any other weapon. However, this comes at the cost of increased weight, limited ammunition, and reduced damage at long range. Unlike Autocannons, Gauss Rifles have a baseline bonus to accuracy, but the Heavy Gauss Rifle does suffer a slight recoil effect from firing.

Gauss Rifles explode if destroyed, taking the entire mounted location with them.
